Commentary: Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, full and snakes back in to hit the pad, but this was sliding down leg
Anwar Ali to Smith, FOUR, width outside off, Smith frees his arms and slaps it fiercely past the covers
Anwar Ali to Smith, FOUR, back of a length and outside off, Smith slogs it past mid-on
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run, back of a length and angled in, Smith nudges a single to the leg side
Anwar Ali to Sharjeel Khan, no run, back of a length, edged to slip on the bounce
Anwar Ali to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, soft short ball outside off, sits up to be hit. Sharjeel obliges, he rocks back, and nails a pull over midwicket
McCullum to Smith, FOUR, drifting across off from round the stumps, reverse-paddled through vacant slip
McCullum to Smith, no run, short and skids off the surface, inside edged behind square
McCullum to Smith, no run, muffled appeal for lbw, not given. He sweeps and misses this full ball. Pitched outside leg
McCullum to Smith, FOUR, a touch short, and this is muscled to the cow corner fence
McCullum to Smith, no run, pitched outside leg and hits the pad
McCullum to Smith, 1 run, leg-stump full ball, which is whipped through midwicket
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run, heading down leg, glanced away in the air.... does not carry to short fine leg
Anwar Ali to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, back of a length on middle, run away to backward point
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, bouncer, forces Smith to duck under it
Anwar Ali to Smith, SIX, back of a length and just outside off, Smith blasts it over the fielder at deep midwicket
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, chopped from outside off to point
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, yorker, dug back to Anwar
McCullum to Sharjeel Khan, no run, sliding into the pads, worked behind square
McCullum to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, short and outside off, dragged to long-on
McCullum to Smith, FOUR, flat and fired through, Smith was late to jab his bat down. He squirts it past the leg stump off an under edge
McCullum to Smith, 1 run, full and arrowed straight, driven to long-on
McCullum to Sharjeel Khan, 1 leg bye, drifting into the pads, diverted behind square. The fielder swoops down on the ball and throws it to Sarfraz who takes the bails off but Smith was in
McCullum to Smith, 1 run, non-turning ball, drilled back to the bowler. Can't quite call it a chance, because Smith smashed the ball. N-Mac may have got a hand to it, just one
Aizaz Cheema to Smith, no run, back of a length on off, pushed back to the bowler
Aizaz Cheema to Smith, 1 run, shortish on off, flicked to square leg
Aizaz Cheema to Sharjeel Khan, no run, back of a length on middle, punched to point
Aizaz Cheema to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, shortish on middle, stylishly pulled away behind square leg
Aizaz Cheema to Sharjeel Khan, 1 leg bye, rushing short ball on the thigh, guided behind square leg
Aizaz Cheema to Smith, no run, another rushing short ball, mis-hit back to the bowler
McCullum to Sharjeel Khan, 1 leg bye, sliding into the pads, Sharjeel goes low and misses the sweep
McCullum to Smith, SIX, fired at over 90ks from round the stumps, slugged over long-on
McCullum to Smith, 1 run, punched past the covers

McCullum to Sharjeel Khan, OUT, Sharjeel steps out, N-Mac did well to loop it up and hold this one back. Sharjeel swings and misses. The bowler hits the leg stump. First wicket in the PSL for him. Sharjeel falls short of a century by 87 runs
McCullum to Haddin, 1 run, jabbed to midwicket
McCullum to Smith, no run, swept straight to backward square leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, 1 run, tossed up and spins away, guided to short third man
Zulfiqar Babar to Smith, no run, arm ball, kept out
Zulfiqar Babar to Smith, SIX, flat, fast, and comes in again. Smith neither left the crease nor the pose. Picked up, drop-kicked over midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Smith, no run, pushed down the ground
Zulfiqar Babar to Smith, 1 run, slapped to long-off
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, FOUR, full toss, lashed away through the covers, Haddin beats long-off
Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, no run, short and drifts in, Smith shapes to pull and takes it on the thigh
Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, 1 run, Smith hangs back and whips a single to the midwicket region
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, no run, flighted and outside off, steps out and quietly drops it to cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, no run, full and outside off, drilled straight to cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, no run, Haddin comes down the track, again. He is beaten in flight, he sends a thick edge to short third man
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, no run, skiddy ball on off, defended to cover. Excellent over from Nawaz
Elliott to Smith, no run, back of a length on off, punched to cover
Elliott to Smith, FOUR, Smith raises his fifty. Full and outside off, hit over extra cover for four
Elliott to Smith, 1 run, slower ball on off, forced to long-off
Elliott to Haddin, SIX, slow roller outside off, swiped over midwicket
Elliott to Haddin, no run, back of a length, punched to the off side
Elliott to Haddin, no run, shorter and outside off, chopped towards point

Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, 1 run, dropped short and outside off, Smith goes back and pulls in the air towards long-on. Anwar runs in, plunges forward, but can't hang onto the catch despite getting both hands to it
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, no run
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, 1 run, chopped from off stump to backward point
Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, no run, arm ball, snakes in, played back to Nawaz
Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, 1 run, flat and fired on top of middle, Smith steps away outside leg and punches past the covers
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, 1 run, hint of turn outside off, steered to short third man for one
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, starts with a slower one well outside off, Haddin guides it to short third man
Aizaz Cheema to Smith, FOUR, what's he eaten today? Cheema angled in a yorker from wide of the crease and Smith flicked quickly enough to get enough bat to send that for four behind square!
Aizaz Cheema to Smith, 1 run, tries the yorker again, Smith flicks it to deep midwicket for one
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, no run, on the off stump, no room, and Haddin defends it to point

Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, FOUR, misfield from Sanga at that's four! Outside off and Haddin slaps it back past the bowler, Sanga ran to his right from long-off but slipped through the ball, maybe because of the dew, and it went to the boundary
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, drives the fuller delivery to long-off
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, 1 run, comes own and slams the ball from outside off to sweeper cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, no run, pushes this one to backward point
Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, 1 run, dropped, was very tough and quick, though! Too full a delivery and Smith hammered it back, Nawaz tried with both hands but it went towards long off after that
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, SIX, too full again, with some room, and Haddin stands tall to loft that straight down the ground for a handsome six!
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, 1 run, angles it in from outside off, Haddin defends it late to short third man for a quick one
Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, 1 run, bit too full, driven to long-off for one
Elliott to Smith, 1 run, pretty full outside off and Smith slogs it along the ground to wide long-on
Elliott to Haddin, 2 runs, slaps this one back over the bowler's head towards long-off. The fielder slides it towards long-on, who slides it back towards long-off who picks it up and throws it
Elliott to Haddin, SIX, that's a slower one at 108.7kph and Haddin has picked it to loft it nicely over long-on and into his team's dugout
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run, shuffles across and slogs this one to the cow corner
Elliott to Smith, no run, pretty wide outside off, Smith swings to the leg side and misses
Elliott to Smith, SIX, tonked! Smith gets a full ball outside off and he dispatches that to the midwicket boudnary by using the middle of the bat. What a cracking shot!
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, no run, tries to slog the ball against the spin from off and misses
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, 1 run, makes room, Babar brings it in with the angle and Haddin nudges it to short third man
Zulfiqar Babar to Smith, 1 run, waits for it to turn from outside off and slaps it to sweeper cover
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, 1 run, just around off and Haddin works it with the angle to leg for one
Zulfiqar Babar to Smith, 1 run, pretty full now and it's drilled down the ground, it hits Haddin's bat and he loses the grip but continues with the single
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, SIX, another six on the last ball of the over! Haddin gets a short one and pulls it with some power to the midwicket boundary!
Aizaz Cheema to Smith, 1 run, short, powerfully pulled and he finds deep midwicket
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, short and wide, slams it to deeper cover for one
Aizaz Cheema to Smith, 1 run, full outside off, Smith drives with power but doesn't get the middle. Still enough for a quick single
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, shuffles across early, it's a slower one, and he works it to short midwicket for a very quick single
Aizaz Cheema to Smith, 1 leg bye, is happy with a leg bye as that deflects to the off side after hitting him outside leg
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 2 runs, low full toss outside off, nicely driven through extra cover and Sanga dives to his left while running from long-off and saves two
Zulfiqar Babar to Smith, 1 run, drilled into the covers for a single, thanks to a fumble at cover
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, 1 run, short and turning away, slapped into the covers and that's Haddin's fifty! What an important knock to make sure Smith didn't have to do it all on his own

Zulfiqar Babar to Smith, OUT, oh my, Smith has given it away! It was outside off and turning away a lot, Smith didn't get anywhere close to the pitch of the ball and only slogged to hand a top edge into the off side. Easy catch for KP at backward point
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, 1 run, nice turn outside off and Haddin pokes it into the off side for a dangerous single, but no direct hit
Wicket: ['DR Smith c Pietersen b Zulfiqar Babar 73 (51b 7x4 4x6) SR: 143.13']

Commentary: Zulfiqar Babar to Russell, SIX, it's too wide and full, Russell gets to free his arms and he does so by swinging them to send the ball flying a long way over the covers. What a way to get off the mark
Zulfiqar Babar to Russell, 1 run, nicely driven with the turn into the covers, along the ground this time
Aizaz Cheema to Russell, OUT, inside edge onto the stumps, Russell is gone! He made some room and the ball angled, he slogged and the ball crashed into the stumps after an edge
Aizaz Cheema to Khalid Latif, 1 run, angling in, pushed down to long-on
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, taps the full and wide delivery to short third man for one
Aizaz Cheema to Khalid Latif, FOUR, short and straight, Latif stands tall and slaps it back over the bowler's head. He's hit it with so much power that it beats long on and long off too
Aizaz Cheema to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, slower one from back of length outside off, heaved towards deep midwicket for two more
Aizaz Cheema to Khalid Latif, FOUR, smashed through the covers for four! Too full, too much room and Latif drove that firmly
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, SIX, brings the RRR down further - goes down on a knee and sweeps that against the turn over the deep midwicket fielder for a clean six!
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, 2 runs, comes down for the flighted full toss and drives that nicely to sweeper cover for two
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, 1 leg bye, shuffles down and takes the ball on the pad outside off for a leg bye
Zulfiqar Babar to Khalid Latif, 1 run, slams the fullish delivery towards long-off for one
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, no run, right in the block hole and he blocks it back
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, no run, comes down this time and it's in the block hole again, inside edge goes square on the leg side
Anwar Ali to Khalid Latif, FOUR, almost! Outside off and he smashes it to the cow corner with a lot of power for a one-bounce four!
Anwar Ali to Khalid Latif, OUT, two runs to go and Khalid Latif top-edges a short ball to short fine leg for an easy catch
Anwar Ali to Haddin, 1 run, full and angling in, Haddin flicks it to short fine leg for a quick single

Anwar Ali to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, tries the yorker, flicks it past midwicket and that's enough! The Islamabad squad runs onto the field, they are the inaugural PSL champions. Misbah hardly shows any emotions, but a smile, while completing the single, Haddin raises his bat in jubilation and takes his helmet off. Akram is jumping with joy beyond the boundary and Irfan runs in while throwing some energy drink bottles in the air with both hands! Misbah completes the run and finally pumps the air with a lunge!
